 2018-14342018-11-22,  ,  ,  ,  ISED, 
ActElectricity and Gas Inspection Act
Weights and Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Electricity and Gas Inspection Regulations and the Weights and Measures Regulations (Miscellaneous)
PrecisRegulations Amending the ELECTRICITY AND GAS INSPECTION REGULATIONS AND THE WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous) in order to modernize and clarify the provisions related to the name and signature required on inspection certificates issued under Electricity and Gas Inspection Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0252 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
